DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate pharmacokinetics CKD-11101 NESP SC administration health male volunteer
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics Study CKD-11101 NESP After SC Administration Health Male Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: Healthy volunteer administrate CKD-11101 60μg NESP 60μg subcutaneously . ( crossover ) Every time take medication , PK parameter safety CKD-11101 60μg NESP 60μg perform use blood sample conduct test ( Laboratory test , V/S Physical Examination , etc ) respectively .
DOC.criteria: Signed informed consent form prior study participation . A healthy male volunteer 20 55 year old . Body weight 55kg 90kg , BMI 18 27 . Appropriate subject study judging investigator ( physical examination , laboratory test , interview , etc . ) Have medical history allergic disease include hypersensitivity drug clinically significant allergic disease Clinically significant hepatic , renal , respiratory system , endocrine system , nervous system , immune system , hematologic , psychiatric , circulatory system , tumor history tumor Have abnormal laboratory result . Hemoglobin < 12g/dL > 17g/dL Vitamin B12 < 200pg/mL Ferritin < 21.8ng/mL Transferrin < 190mg/dL Reticulocyte normal limit Positive Triage TOX drug urine ( cocaine , amphetamine , barbiturate , opiate , benzodiazepine , cannabinoids ) Positive HIV antibody , HBsAg , HCV antibody test A heavy smoker ( cigarette > 10 cigarette per day ) Administer EPO , darbepoetin , immunoglobulin IV iron within 3 month prior first IP administration Have hypersensitivity reaction history EPO , darbepoetin , excipient IP iron tablet sit SBP < 90mmHg sit SBP > 140mmHg sit DBP < 55mmHg sit DBP > 90mmHg Pulse rate > 100 per/min History hemoglobinopathy inflammatory disease drug abuse within 6 month screen Subject take ethical drug herbal medicine within 14 day , OTC vitamin supplement within 7 day first IP administration Participated clinical trial administrate IP within 8 week prior first IP administration A heavy alcohol consumer ( alcohol > 21 units/week ) stop drink Bleed donate blood ( > 400mL ) within 8 week first IP administration Participated clinical trial administrate IP Have diet within 2 day first IP administration stop food contain grapefruit food contain caffeine Disagree avoid get pregnant clinical trial An impossible one participate clinical trial investigator 's decision include laboratory test result , reason
